resources.string:
Note that all data (e.g. photos, videos) you generate using this app are stored locally on the device. When you decide to upload your responses, these data will be stored in your personal cloud storage. However other people will be able to see your responses. We may also analyse your responses for our research purposes and your identity will be kept anonymous.

Please accept that these are prototypes and problems with reliability can occur. However, in case you do experience technical problems (or if you have suggestions for improvements) then please do contact thesharcproject@gmail.com so that we can try to improve the prototypes.

Click the I Agree button to continue or Cancel to quit the app.
No internet/data connection detected. Please ensure that Wi-Fi/Data is enabled on your device and you are in a Wi-Fi/Data coverage
You need to sign in with your personal cloud account to upload response. Please do so by opening the slide menu on the left and tap the human icon
Sorry, the application could not detect your current location. Please check your GPS service
You have not yet opened any experience
There were some errors when uploading data to the server. Please try again
Your current location falls within the trigger zone for this Point of Interest
Your current location does not fall within the trigger zone for this Point of Interest
